name: Yoimiya
desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
This character gains <color=#ffffff>Niwabi Enshou</color> . (This Skill does not grant Energy)
<color=#ece5d8>Niwabi Enshou</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG, and their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> <color=#ffffffd9>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Aurous Blaze</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Aurous Blaze</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
After your character other than Yoimiya uses a Skill: Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> <color=#ffffffd9>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Genius Invokation TCG? The kids at Hanamizaka love that game - and I've got a deck I put together as well!"
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: "Yoimiya" is the offensive core of Yoimiya's deck, which comes with a great number of cards that can be used to enhance Normal Attacks.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc:
"Trial by Fire" Bennett

Once you know that you will certainly lose, then you must certainly know the way to win.

customize.name: Chongyun
customize.desc:
"Frozen Ardor" Chongyun

"Ugh, summer… Please pass us by in peace…"

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
"Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.

customize.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
customize.desc:
Yoimiya: Naganohara Meteor Swarm

Naganohara Ideal Firework Reserve Theory.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
customize.desc:
Yoimiya: Naganohara Meteor Swarm

Naganohara Ideal Firework Reserve Theory.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Even card games have got to be taken seriously, I'm not gonna let you win easily this time!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Yoimiya" starts with the Talent Card "Naganohara Meteor Swarm" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
value.desc:
Yoimiya: Naganohara Meteor Swarm

Naganohara Ideal Firework Reserve Theory.

value.text: Reward for inviting Yoimiya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Yoimiya
value.desc: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.
